User Guide¶

Welcome to the user guide for the “oc_lettings_site” project! This guide will help you understand and navigate the features of the application.

Table of Contents¶

Introduction¶

The “oc_lettings_site” is a web application designed to help users browse available lettings, view user profiles, and manage their accounts. Here’s a quick overview of the main features:

  • Browsing Lettings: Explore available lettings and view detailed information.

  • Viewing Profiles: Learn more about other users by viewing their profiles.

  • Manage Profiles and lettings: Create or update a profile or a letting to personalize your experience.

  • Contacting a Letting: Use the provided contact information to inquire about a letting.

  • Managing Your Account: Update your profile details and preferences.

Browsing Lettings¶

  1. Home Page: - Visit the home page to see a list of all available lettings. - Click on a letting to view more details.

  2. Letting Details: - On the letting details page, find information such as the title, address, and contact details. - Use the provided contact information to inquire about the letting.

Viewing Profiles¶

  1. Profiles Page: - Navigate to the profiles section to see a list of user profiles. - Click on a profile to view more details.

  2. Profile Details: - On the profile details page, learn more about the user, including their favorite city.

Manage Profiles and lettings¶

  1. Login: - Access admin and login.

  1. Manage: - Follow the prompts to manage Profiles and lettings.

Contacting a Letting¶

  1. Contact Information: - On the letting details page, find the contact information of the letting owner or agent. - Use the provided email or phone number to inquire about the letting.

Managing Your Account¶

  1. Profile Settings: - Visit the “admin” page to update your details, change your password, or set your favorite city.

  2. Logout: - Click on “Logout” to securely log out of your account.

That’s it! You are now ready to explore and make the most of the features offered by the “oc_lettings_site” project. If you have any questions or encounter issues, refer to the contact section for assistance.
